channel.title: Barrage DELTA
channel.description:
How to fix barrage timing "DELTA"
Hi, i am having some trouble with my barraging atm. During pking player vs player, when i freeze them and far cast i can constantly keep clicking barrage on them. Every time i do my character runs towards them, and my barrage is slow because every time i cast the spell i have to wait 10secs or so before casting again properly.
Hope i can get help, Ty for your time.
